name: obnoxiousness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being very unpleasant or rude: They defended her against charges of obnoxiousness. Most people ignored his obnoxiousness. See
obnoxious
More examplesFewer examplesShe is behaving with obnoxiousness.His obnoxiousness is upsetting us all.Despite her obnoxiousness, the audience started to care about her.
